title: All-New Alchemy Rogue Gravel & Argos Ti MTB join updated Arktos w/ flip chip
content:
It appears that Alchemy has been busy. Quite busy. This year at Sea Otter they’re unveiling two completely new bikes, a substantial update to an existing model, and even more options for custom frame finishes – including in-house Cerakote. Alchemy Argos Ti Hardtail Named after the Argos Trail which will be directly behind Alchemy’s soon-to-be

The post All-New Alchemy Rogue Gravel & Argos Ti MTB join updated Arktos w/ flip chip appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
